short.es: Reloj digital con diseños coloridos y reloj con nueva pestaña abierta

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,es_419,:
Klak - New Tab With Colorful Designs for Google Chrome🕘

Digital clock with unique designs for Google Chrome. NEW! + 12 Different design themes available
You are looking for a digital clock without complications.

This extension is a simple clock with many designs to check the time directly in your browser.

(NEW) You can configure:
✓ Change clock time format, 24 hours or 12 hours.
long.de,en_GB,en_US,es,ko,pt_BR,ru,zh_CN:
Star Clock — Kluk

With Colorfull Designs for Google Chrome🕘

Digital clock with unique designs for Google Chrome. NEW! + 10 Different design themes available
You are looking for a digital clock without complications.

This extension is a simple clock with many designs to check the time directly in your browser.

You will see:

✓ Digital clock.
✓ Day / Date.
✓ Hours, minutes and seconds.
✓ Month.
✓ Year.
✓ Custom colors for text and background!
✓ Setting the background to be an image linked from somewhere!
✓ Custom fonts!
✓ 12 hour and 24 hour time!
✓ Seconds display! (or not!)


(NEW) You can configure:

✓ Change clock time format, 24 hours or 12 hours.
✓ Customize clock background (More than 100 designs available). 
✓ Choose and change your favorite language.



NOTE:

Clock for Google Chrome ™ is available in One language.

This digital clock is compatible with the main Microsoft Edge browser with Windows, Mac, Linux and other operating systems.

It is also compatible with Chrome, Edge, Firefox, Safari and Opera browsers.
